item.title: Sheet masks are perfect for today's busy lifestyle, says Jung Ji-woo - Mint
item.description:
Jung Ji-woo's Neaf Neaf: A New Arrival in India’s K-Beauty Scene

Publication Date: Not specified, Source: Mint

South Korean beauty entrepreneur Jung Ji-woo launches her brand Neaf Neaf in India, aiming to cater to the growing K-beauty market among Indian consumers.

  • Neaf Neaf was launched at the Kosmos festival in Delhi.
  • The brand focuses on plant-derived ingredients and will feature a PDRN product range.
  • Jung Ji-woo discusses her motivations and insights into the Indian beauty market.
"The Korean beauty industry is trying to expand its presence in India."

This initiative is part of a broader trend of increasing K-beauty influence in India, meeting local consumer demands.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra gets huge price drop once again, now available for just Rs 2,692 per month - India TV News
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra gets huge price drop once again, now available for just Rs 2,692 per month

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: India TV News

Samsung has significantly reduced the price of its Galaxy S23 Ultra during the New Year Sale on Flipkart. The phone is now available for Rs 40,000 less, though it's still above its lowest price.

  • The Galaxy S23 Ultra is now priced at Rs 76,560, down from Rs 1,49,999.
  • Offers available include bank discounts, no-cost EMI, and additional savings for trade-ins.
  • Features a 200MP camera, 12GB RAM, 256GB storage, and a 6.81-inch Dynamic AMOLED display.
  • Includes advanced features like S-Pen functionality, 5000mAh battery, and 45W charging.
  • Quad-camera system and 12MP front camera for photography enthusiasts.
  • Flipkart is offering 5% cashback with specific credit cards.
“The phone supports S-Pen functionality and packs a robust 5000mAh battery.”

The Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra's price drop makes it an appealing option for consumers seeking premium features at a reduced cost.

item.title: Garena Free Fire MAX redeem codes, January 4, 2025, edition: Unlock rewards and level up your gameplay - The Financial Express
item.description:
Garena Free Fire MAX redeem codes, January 4, 2025 edition: Unlock rewards and level up your gameplay

Date: January 4, 2025

Source: Financial Express

Garena Free Fire MAX, a popular battle royale game, offers daily redeem codes that allow players to unlock exclusive rewards. These codes have become a key feature driving the game's popularity, especially following the ban of the original Free Fire due to privacy concerns.

  • Frequent updates and challenges keep players engaged.
  • Redeem codes unlock items such as skins, diamonds, and gear without additional costs.
  • Each code is valid for just 24 hours, creating urgency among players to redeem them quickly.
  • The game competes effectively with other popular battle royale games like PUBG Mobile.
  • Redeeming codes involves logging into the Garena website and entering the provided code.

The listed redeem codes for January 4, 2025:

XF4SWKCH6KY4, FVTCQK2MFNSK, FFWX9TSY2QK7, FFWST4NYM6XB, PFS5Y7NQFV9S, FFNYX2HQWCVK, YF6WN9QSFTHX, FF4MTXQPFDZ9, RDNAFV2KX2CQ, FV4SF2CQFY9M, HQK6FX2YT9GG, FFXT7SW9KG2M, FFWCY6TSX2QZ, FFXMTK9QFFX9

Players are encouraged to continuously check for new codes to maximize their in-game performance and enjoy an enhanced gaming experience.

item.title: Meet Eclipsa Audio, the free-to-use Dolby Atmos alternative made by Google and Samsung - The Indian Express
item.description:
Meet Eclipsa Audio, the free-to-use Dolby Atmos alternative made by Google and Samsung

Publication Date: January 2025
Source: Indian Express

Google and Samsung recently unveiled Eclipsa Audio, a new 3D audio format that will be featured on Samsung made TVs and smartbars launched in 2025.

  • Eclipsa Audio allows creators to adjust audio data for an immersive 3D experience.
  • The new format will be available on Samsung's Crystal UHD series to premium Neo QLED 8K models.
  • It is a free and open-source alternative to Dolby Atmos.
  • Available on YouTube, but requires adoption by streaming services.
“We are excited to see how the creator community uses it to create new and innovative audio experiences.” - Google Chrome executive

Eclipsa Audio presents a notable challenge in terms of adoption despite being free, as the ecosystem for supported devices remains small compared to Dolby Atmos.

item.title: iPhone 16 Plus now available for only Rs 39,750, here's how to avail this offer - India TV News
item.description:
Massive Discount on iPhone 16 Plus: Now Available for Rs 39,750

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: India TV News

The new year has brought excellent discounts on smartphones, particularly on the iPhone 16 series. The iPhone 16 Plus is now available for Rs 39,750 through various offers and discounts.

  • The iPhone 16 Plus has a listed price of Rs 89,900 but has dropped to Rs 84,900 due to a 5% discount.
  • Add an instant discount of Rs 4,000 with specific credit card payments, reducing the price further to Rs 80,900.
  • By trading in an old smartphone, customers can receive an additional exchange value of Rs 41,150.
  • Overall, with all offers applied, the iPhone 16 Plus can be purchased for just Rs 39,750.
  • The smartphone features a 6.7-inch Super AMOLED display, IP68 certification, and runs on iOS 18.
  • It is powered by the Apple A18 Bionic chipset and offers up to 8GB RAM and 512GB storage.
“If you make the most of these offers, you could walk away with the iPhone 16 Plus for just Rs 39,750.”

In conclusion, this is a great opportunity for customers looking to invest in an iPhone this new year.

item.title: Samsung may have a ‘plan’ to beat Sony's iPhone camera ‘dominance’ - The Times of India
item.description:
Samsung Plans Strategy to Challenge Sony's iPhone Camera Dominance

Publication Date: [Date Not Specified] | Source: Times of India

Samsung is reportedly devising a plan to enhance its camera technology in order to compete with Sony's dominance in the smartphone camera market.

  • Samsung aims to improve user experience with innovative camera features.
  • The company is investing in advanced imaging technologies.
  • The competition is driven by the increasing demand for high-quality smartphone photography.
"Our goal is to ensure that our users have the best photography experience possible." - Samsung Executive

This latest development highlights the ongoing competition between major smartphone manufacturers and the significance of camera quality in attracting consumers.

item.title: SpaceX's Starship to deploy mock satellites in next test - Deccan Herald
item.description:
SpaceX's Starship to Deploy Mock Satellites in Upcoming Test Flight

Published: 04 January 2025, 00:50 IST

Elon Musk's SpaceX is preparing for a crucial test of its Starship rocket, which will attempt to deploy payloads in space by releasing 10 model Starlink satellites. This marks a significant step in Starship's development as a satellite launch vehicle.

  • The Starship flight will take place from Boca Chica, Texas, later this month.
  • This will be the first exercise of a satellite deployment mission, showcasing Starship's capabilities.
  • October's test saw the 'Super Heavy' booster successfully returning to its launch pad.
  • The rocket aims to support future satellite launches and SpaceX's plans to colonize Mars.
"Starship is the centerpiece of SpaceX's future satellite launch business."

With its powerful design, Starship is set to expand SpaceX's Starlink internet network and support NASA's plans to return astronauts to the moon.

item.title: NPCI moving to give netbanking a UPI-like makeover | Mint - Mint
item.description:
NPCI Aims to Transform Netbanking with UPI-Style Integration

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Mint

Mumbai: A pilot project by the National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI) could resolve the common issue of missing banks in netbanking options during mobile payments on e-commerce sites.

  • The problem arises from the way merchants collaborate with payment gateways, leading to difficulties in bank visibility for consumers.
  • The NPCI initiative aims to streamline integrations and improve user experience by using a UPI-like model for netbanking.
  • This transformation seeks to enhance payment efficiency and accessibility for a larger number of consumers.
“This stumbling block faced by many consumers may be fixed if a pilot rolled out by the National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI) last month works out.”

This development promises to increase convenience for users and could signify a major shift in how online payments are processed in India.

item.title: Mercedes CLE Cabriolet Review - Drop-top motoring is a civilised affair - Driven
item.description:
Mercedes CLE Cabriolet Review - A Civilized Drop-top Driving Experience

Publication Date: December 24
Source: Driven

The Mercedes CLE Cabriolet merges the qualities of the C-Class and E-Class convertibles into a stylish and tech-savvy vehicle that offers a civilized open-top motoring experience.

  • The CLE Cabriolet replaces both the C-Class Cabriolet and E-Class Cabriolet.
  • Offers various engine options, including the powerful AMG models.
  • Interior space is improved compared to predecessors, comfortably seating four.
  • Notable features include the Airscarf warm air system for neck comfort and an effective wind deflector.
  • Base price for the CLE 300 starts at £53,030, with the top model at £70,320.
  • Handling is geared towards comfort rather than sportiness, making it ideal for relaxed cruising.
“When it comes to cruising along in a glamorous-looking car, they don’t get much better than this.”

The Mercedes CLE Cabriolet stands out with its sleek design, advanced features, and a focus on comfort, making it an excellent option for luxury open-top driving enthusiasts.

item.title: Samsung to supply Apple with advanced camera sensors for iPhone 18 series in 2026: Report | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Samsung to supply Apple with advanced camera sensors for iPhone 18 series in 2026: Report

Publication Date: N/A Source: Live Mint

A new report indicates that Samsung is developing a groundbreaking 500MP camera sensor aimed at enhancing smartphone photography, which may debut in its upcoming Galaxy S25 Ultra. Additionally, the report suggests that Samsung is creating an advanced sensor for the iPhone 18 series, marking a shift from Apple’s usual partnership with Sony.

  1. Samsung may introduce a 500MP camera sensor, enhancing mobile photography quality.
  2. The new sensor could debut in Galaxy S25 Ultra devices.
  3. Apple’s iPhone 18 series might be the first to incorporate Samsung's camera sensors.
  4. The iPhone 18 is expected to feature variable aperture technology.
  5. Samsung's sensor is reported to perform better than Sony’s Exmor RS sensors.
This would mark a significant departure from Apple's longstanding partnership with Sony for CMOS image sensors.

In conclusion, the collaboration between Samsung and Apple, particularly regarding camera technology, indicates a significant shift in the smartphone industry's competitive landscape.

item.title: GTA 6 release in 2025: This is how much money Grand Theft Auto 6 is expected to make in its first year - The Times of India
item.description:
GTA 6 release in 2025: This is how much money Grand Theft Auto 6 is expected to make in its first year

Publication Date: Unknown
Source: Unknown

Grand Theft Auto 6 is set to be released in 2025, with projections estimating substantial financial returns in its first year.

  • The game is highly anticipated among fans of the franchise.
  • Experts predict that it could become one of the highest-grossing games shortly after release.
  • Market trends indicate a growing demand for action-adventure games.
“GTA 6 could redefine expectations for video game revenues.”

The upcoming release of GTA 6 is expected to have a significant impact on the gaming industry and could surpass previous sales records.

item.title: Bird-Inspired Wing Design Could Boost Performance of Aeroplanes, Claims Study - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Bird-Inspired Wing Design Could Boost Performance of Aeroplanes

Publication Date: N/A Source: Gadgets 360

The flight dynamics of birds have inspired innovative enhancements for aeroplane wings, particularly featherlike flaps that improve lift, reduce drag, and prevent stalls, enhancing efficiency and safety during challenging maneuvers.

  • Featherlike flaps improve lift by up to 45% and reduce drag by 31% during wind tunnel tests.
  • These components automatically adjust to aerodynamic conditions, improving performance at high angles of attack.
  • Testing has shown improved flight stability, especially in gusty weather.
  • The design aims to enhance aircraft performance during critical landing and takeoff operations.
Aimy Wissa, an engineer at Princeton University, stated, "The design of these flaps does not rely on mechanical controls but rather responds naturally to aerodynamic conditions."

The development of bird-inspired innovations holds promise for advancing aviation technology, leading to a new era of aircraft design focused on efficiency and stability.

item.title: Rockstar Confirms GTA 6 Will Launch on PC, PlayStation, and Xbox On Same Day - ThePhilox
item.description:
Rockstar Confirms GTA 6 Will Launch on PC, PlayStation, and Xbox On Same Day

Publication Date: Not specified Source: The Philox

This announcement marks a significant shift for Rockstar Games, confirming that Grand Theft Auto 6 will simultaneously launch on all major platforms, alleviating previous concerns about delays for PC gamers.

  • Grand Theft Auto 6 will launch on PC, PlayStation, and Xbox on the same day.
  • This decision aims to unify the gaming experience across platforms, unlike previous staggered releases.
  • Rockstar intends to foster inclusivity and community engagement among players.
  • The company is adapting lessons learned from the delayed release of GTA V.
  • Anticipation for the game is at an all-time high as fans eagerly await its details.
"A simultaneous launch would likely attract a greater number of players at the opening." – The Philox

The simultaneous release of GTA 6 represents a bold new direction for Rockstar, promising to engage a diverse audience and enhance community interaction from day one.

item.title: Black Ops 6 and Squid Game Collaboration: Start date, game modes, event pass rewards and pricing - The Economic Times
item.description:
Black Ops 6 and Squid Game Collaboration: Start date, game modes, event pass rewards and pricing

Last Updated: 03 January, 2025 10:07 AM GMT - The Feed

Activision has announced a collaboration between Black Ops 6 and Squid Game, launching on January 3. The event includes limited-time game modes, an Event Pass with rewards and integration across Warzone and Zombies.

Key Points:

  • The collaboration starts on January 3, coinciding with the Season 1 Reloaded update.
  • An Event Pass is available, featuring free and premium tracks.
  • Multiplayer modes include Pentathalon and Squid Game Moshpit.
  • Event Pass costs 1100 CoD points; players can purchase tier skips for 150 CoD points.
  • Game modes feature rotating squad objectives and challenging mechanics.

Notable Quotes:

“The Squid Game event introduces its own Event Pass, featuring both free and premium tracks.”

Conclusion: The collaboration is highly anticipated and brings new gaming experiences to Black Ops 6, appealing to both fans of the game and the popular series, Squid Game.

item.title: Apple's MagSafe inspired? OnePlus 13 series to debut magnetic cases and charging: Report | Mint - Mint
item.description:
OnePlus 13 Series to Feature Magnetic Cases and Charging Similar to Apple’s MagSafe

Publication Date: January 7, 2025 | Source: Live Mint

OnePlus is set to unveil its OnePlus 13 series smartphones, which will introduce magnetic functionality akin to Apple’s MagSafe. The series will support various magnetic accessories, enhancing charging solutions.

  • The OnePlus 13 series will include models with magnetic cases designed to support magnetic accessories.
  • A 5,000mAh magnetic power bank and a 50W AIRVOOC magnetic wireless charger are expected to accompany the launch.
  • OnePlus 13 will feature high-end specifications, including a 6.82-inch AMOLED display and Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 8 Elite processor.
  • The OnePlus 13R will have slightly less advanced features with a focus on affordability.
  • The launch event will also debut a new variant of the Buds Pro 3.
“These magnetic cases may align with the Qi2 wireless charging standard, ensuring compatibility with numerous third-party accessories.”

The launch of the OnePlus 13 series is highly anticipated, particularly due to its innovative magnetic accessories and powerful specifications.

item.title: Tech wrap Jan 3: Samsung OLED monitors, Huawei Watch GT 5 Pro, OPPO Reno 13 - Business Standard
item.description:
Tech Wrap Jan 3: Samsung OLED monitors, Huawei Watch GT 5 Pro, OPPO Reno 13

Published on: Jan 03 2025 | Source: BS Tech, New Delhi

In today's tech wrap, Samsung reveals new OLED monitors ahead of CES 2025, Huawei launches the Watch GT 5 Pro, and OPPO shares details about the Reno 13 series.

  • Samsung unveils its latest Smart Monitor and Odyssey Series OLED gaming monitor featuring 4K resolution and 240Hz refresh rate ahead of CES 2025.
  • Huawei launches the Watch GT 5 Pro in India with advanced health features including ECG monitoring.
  • OPPO announces details about the Reno 13 series, highlighting AI-powered tools for photography and productivity.
  • Apple updates its vintage products list, categorizing the Apple Watch Series 4 as vintage.
  • Leak suggests OnePlus 13 series smartphones may feature magnetic functionality similar to Apple’s MagSafe.
"Samsung has introduced its latest lineup of monitors ahead of the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) 2025, which begins on January 7 in Las Vegas, US."

This tech wrap highlights significant innovations and updates in the tech industry, marking an exciting beginning to the year.

item.title: Redmi Note 14 Series Global Launch Date Set For January 10; Redmi Watch 5, Buds 6 Pro to Tag Along - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Redmi Note 14 Series, Watch 5, Buds 6 Pro Global Launch Date Confirmed

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Gadgets 360

The Redmi Note 14 series smartphones, along with the Buds 6 Pro and Watch 5, will launch globally on January 10, 2025. This follows their earlier releases in China and India.

  • Global launch on January 10, 2025.
  • Features a 200-megapixel main rear camera.
  • IP68-rated for dust and water resistance.
  • Includes Xiaomi's 165W Power Bank 10000.
  • Redmi Buds 6 Pro offer up to 55dB ANC and 36 hours total battery life.
  • Redmi Watch 5 provides a 2.07-inch AMOLED display with up to 24 days usage on a single charge.
"The Redmi Note 14 series will be introduced with AI-backed imaging and photo editing features."

In conclusion, the global launch of the Redmi Note 14 series, Buds 6 Pro, and Watch 5 highlights Xiaomi's push into international markets with impressive technology and features set to attract attention.

item.title: Nvidia DLSS 4 to launch with RTX 5090 and 5080, says leaker - Sportskeeda
item.description:
Nvidia DLSS 4 to launch with RTX 5090 and 5080, says leaker

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Sportskeeda

According to recent leaks, Nvidia's DLSS 4 may debut alongside the powerful RTX 5090 and 5080 graphics cards, potentially introducing significant advancements in AI upscaling technology.

  • Latest information from leaker Kopite7kimi suggests imminent launch of DLSS 4 with RTX series.
  • Insights point to a new technology stack that could greatly enhance image upscaling.
  • Previous leaks hint at new features like "Neural Rendering" and "Generative AI Acceleration" for improved graphics.
  • Speculation exists about DLSS 4's compatibility with older RTX models (40, 30, 20 series).
  • CES 2025, scheduled for January 6, will provide more details about DLSS 4.
“Revolutionizing how graphics are processed and displayed.” – Inno3D on Neural Rendering technology.

The upcoming DLSS 4 release is highly anticipated in the gaming community, with expectations of substantial advancements in visual performance and compatibility across different GPU generations.

item.title: Samsung Creating 3-Layer Stacked Image Sensor For Apple, 500MP Galaxy Camera - NDTV Profit
item.description:
Samsung Creating 3-Layer Stacked Image Sensor For Apple, 500MP Galaxy Camera

Publication Date: January 3, 2025; Source: Bloomberg Quint

Samsung is reportedly developing a 500MP camera sensor for its Galaxy smartphones along with a three-layer stacked image sensor for Apple. This marks a significant development in smartphone photography technology.

  • Samsung aims to produce a 500MP camera sensor for its Galaxy devices.
  • The new sensor technology could be a main camera for future Samsung smartphones.
  • A three-layer stacked image sensor is under development for Apple, potentially enhancing iPhone camera capabilities.
  • Samsung will continue using a 200MP sensor for the Galaxy S25 Ultra, with the 500MP sensor possibly debuting in later models.
  • Apple may switch from Sony's camera sensors to Samsung's in the upcoming iPhone 18 series.
  • The stacked sensor configuration promises faster signal processing and improved image quality.
“Samsung is currently developing a ‘3-layer stacked’ image sensor in a PD-TR-Logic configuration for Apple.” - Jukanlosreve

The advancements in sensor technology signify a pivotal shift in mobile photography for both Samsung and Apple customers. This could lead to enhanced capabilities in capturing high-resolution images with better clarity.

item.title: Vivo T3X receives an official price cut: Check what it costs now | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Vivo T3X receives an official price cut: Check what it costs now

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Live Mint

Good news for those looking to buy the Vivo T3X, as it has received an official price reduction of ₹1,000 across all variants in India, responding to competition in the sub-15,000 price segment.

Vivo T3X: Here are the new prices

  • 4GB + 128GB model: ₹12,499
  • 6GB + 128GB model: ₹13,999
  • 8GB + 128GB model: ₹15,499

Vivo T3X 5G: Specifications

Powerful Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 chipset with configurations up to 8GB RAM and 128GB storage. Features include a 50MP primary camera and an 8MP front camera, a 6.72-inch 120Hz display, and a 6,000mAh battery with 44W fast charging.

item.title: RTX 5090 laptop VRAM capacity leaks: RTX 50 flagship to enjoy 50% VRAM bump vs RTX 4090 thanks to new GDDR7 modules - Notebookcheck.net
item.description:
RTX 5090 laptop VRAM capacity leaks: RTX 50 flagship to enjoy 50% VRAM bump vs RTX 4090 thanks to new GDDR7 modules

Date: 2025-01-03 Source: Notebookcheck

The VRAM size of the RTX 5090 laptop GPU has leaked, indicating a 50% increase over the RTX 4090 laptop. This enhancement is due to the use of new 3 GB GDDR7 modules.

Key Points:

  • The RTX 5090 is expected to feature 24 GB of VRAM on a 256-bit bus.
  • Only the RTX 5090 will utilize the 3 GB GDDR7 modules in the RTX 50 lineup.
  • Gaming laptops featuring the RTX 5090 are set to debut in February 2025.
  • Performance is expected to be improved compared to the RTX 4090 due to a higher TGP and more CUDA cores.
The RTX 5090 laptop could rely on the GB203 Blackwell GPU, featuring 10,752 CUDA cores.

Overall, the announcement of the RTX 5090's specifications builds anticipation for significant performance advancements in mobile GPUs.
